actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to extend and modify the temporary reduction of duty on acrylic filament tow imported in the form of 8 sub-bundles crimped together, each containing 24,000 filaments (plus or minus 10 percent).

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to provide temporarily for the duty-free treatment of acrylic filament tow imported in the form of 8 sub-bundles crimped together, each containing 24,000 filaments (plus or minus 10 percent).

titles.title: A bill to extend and modify the temporary reduction of duty on acrylic filament tow imported in the form of 8 sub-bundles crimped together, each containing 24,000 filaments (plus or minus 10 percent).
